localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: It's been a long 2020, eh? 🥵 Sometimes, thanking someone for going above and beyond their ways to help you is not enough. Send them a "kudos" in a public Slack channel to share their awesomeness with everyone and spread a bit of positivity. 🚀
blogPost.body: It's been a long 2020, eh? 🥵 Sometimes, thanking someone for going above and beyond their ways to help you is not enough. Send them a "kudos" in a public Slack channel to share their awesomeness with everyone and spread a bit of positivity. 🚀
blogPost.title: Kudosbot - Your friendly neighbourhood kudos spreader.
blogPost.author: Nikhil Gurnani

localize.description: 这是一个漫长的2020年，嗯？🥵 有时候，感谢一个人对你的帮助是远远不够的。在公共Slack频道里给他们发个 "赞"，和大家一起分享他们的精彩，传播一点正能量。🚀
localize.tagline: 你的友好邻居的赞誉传播者。

localize.description: 這是一個漫長的2020年，嗯？🥵 有時候，感謝一個人對你的幫助是遠遠不夠的。在公共Slack頻道里給他們發個 "贊"，和大家一起分享他們的精彩，傳播一點正能量。🚀
localize.tagline: 你的友好鄰居的讚譽傳播者。

previous.excerpt: NexStem Headset and Wisdom SDK allows you to capture high quality EEG data and process them in real-time to give predictions about what you are thinking, and then deploy that to a device or application to control them using nothing but your thoughts.
previous.title: NexStem Headset & Wisdom SDK - Develop and deploy mind-controlled devices and applications

localize.description: NexStem Headset and Wisdom SDK允许您采集高质量的脑电图数据，并实时处理这些数据，以预测您的想法，然后将其部署到设备或应用程序中，只用您的想法来控制它们。
localize.tagline: 开发和部署精神控制设备和应用程序

localize.description: NexStem Headset and Wisdom SDK允許您採集高質量的腦電圖數據，並實時處理這些數據，以預測您的想法，然後將其部署到設備或應用程序中，只用您的想法來控制它們。
localize.tagline: 開發和部署精神控制設備和應用程序

next.excerpt: Lullaby helps treat Tinnitus, a condition that makes you hear a very annoying sound for the rest of your life. Most of the ENTs I checked with seemed poorly prepared to help their patients with the stress, so the app teaches you a healthy way to do that.
next.title: Lullaby - Helps you treat Tinnitus, a chronic health condition

localize.description: 摇篮曲有助于治疗耳鸣，这是一种让你在余生中听到非常恼人的声音的情况。我检查过的大多数耳鼻喉科医生似乎都没有准备好帮助他们的病人解决压力，所以这个应用程序教你一个健康的方法。
localize.tagline: 帮助您治疗慢性病--耳鸣。

localize.description: 搖籃曲有助於治療耳鳴，這是一種讓你在餘生中聽到非常惱人的聲音的情況。我檢查過的大多數耳鼻喉科醫生似乎都沒有準備好幫助他們的病人解決壓力，所以這個應用程序教你一個健康的方法。
localize.tagline: 幫助您治療慢性病--耳鳴。
